item.title: 0977 ET
item.description: score:977 Chances: Energy Transfer had strong performance from its operations, delivering record volumes across its segments, which may be positively received by investors. The company offers a prodigious income stream, and its monster distribution significantly exceeded reported net income, which could attract income-seeking investors.
